mapper.insert: insert into rental_obj values(rental_obj_seq.nextval, #{p_category_code}, #{title}, #{content}, #{member_id}, #{price}, #{post_no}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{phone}, to_date(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'))
mapper.select: select * from rental_obj order by rental_obj_code desc
